text:
@ABC How to pay tribute to healthcare workers 👇
Get them enough PPE
Get them enough coronavirus testing
Make free meals available, they are working overtime
Give hospitals adequate PPP to avoid salary reductions
Most of all
#StayHomeSaveLives 
#StayingHomeIsTheNewSexy
